SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bid_list (id, listing_id, debt_id, amount, price_for_sale_rate, credit_code, bid_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{debtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceForSaleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update bid_list set listing_id = #{listingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, debt_id = #{debtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price_for_sale_rate = #{priceForSaleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, credit_code = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_time = #{bidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, listing_id, debt_id, amount, price_for_sale_rate, credit_code, bid_time from bid_list
